meanings.definition: A large aircraft carrier capable of carrying a large number of aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The supercarriers sailed gracefully through the ocean, carrying many planes on board.
meanings.sent2: The military deployed supercarriers to support their air operations.
meanings.sent3: The supercarriers decided to have a race to see which one was the fastest in the fleet.
meanings.sent4: In the vast sea, the supercarriers stood out like floating islands of power.
meanings.sent5: The supercarriers loomed on the horizon, a symbol of strength and capability.

meanings.definition: A company or organization that operates a fleet of large ships for transporting goods.
meanings.sent1: The supercarriers transported goods across the ocean efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Global trade heavily relies on supercarriers for shipping products worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The supercarriers held a contest to see who could load and unload cargo the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the busy port, the supercarriers lined up like giants ready to carry their precious cargo.
meanings.sent5: The supercarriers navigated the stormy seas, ensuring goods reached their destinations on time.
